site_name: Flat A, 7 Ladbroke Gardens, LONDON, W11 2PT
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (Submission of details) of listed building consent LB/24/01308 (Reinstatement of coal hole cover; installation of 3no. flushed rooflights to rear extension roof terrace; lowering of finished floor levels in rear extension and patio; lengthening of exterior doors to patio to suit FFL; extending rear patio area to accomodate SuDS planters; enlargement of sash window on rear elevation; replacement of non-original front door; removal of non-original partitions; partial blocking off of 1no. original door; creation of structural opening containing a jib door; blocking off 1no. non-original door, replacement of non-original fire surround; linen cupboard with a shower cubicle; removal of 1no. window and masonry apron; lighting scheme; joinery; alterations to LGF utility room layout; partial infill of original vents to wine cellar; redesign of approved new staircase)
